doc.title: Isa 9000
doc.plot: Manuela, Elia, Sergio, Gianni and Lello are five amateur kidnappers plotting to abduct the actress, Isa Danieli. Mico Galdieri, a theatre producer, sent them to kidnap Isa in order to clone her, thus enabling her long and successful career to continue. During this time spent with her kidnappers, Isa befriended and told them about her work and personal experiences with Eduardo De Filippo,Giorgio Strelher, Roberto De Simone, Enzo Moscato and Annibale Ruccello. In the meantime Gigi, who is Isa's partner, awaits the kidnapper's phone call at Rino Marcelli's house. Lina Wertmuller talk's to Mimmo Liguoro about Isa. Moscato finds out about the kidnapping while doing some shopping. Mico Galdieri explains his plans to an assistant about cloning, Doctor De Omnibus voiced many arguments including, Cloning and about the Genetically Modified Organisms. Documentaries, fiction, reports , video clips and musicals are elements that help to compose the image of this great Neapolitan actress, Isa Danieli, and at the same time the movie is also a clear statement against the cloning of the human body.
